name: Fencing Meka
description:
Hey !

This my participation for this 46th Ludum Dare !

I made the game and all the assets in the 48 hours of the Ludum Dare Compo range time.

Hope you will enjoy this little platforming adventure, it's a bit short though !

It's about a meka with enough kindness to help a plant, and he discovers his love and talent for fencing !

- Solweak 

CONTROL :  Jump - "Space"

                             Move - Directional Arrows (left and right)

                            Interact - "E"

Edit : 20/04 Corrected a bug with checkpoint encountered after finishing the game and replaying it
